description: The application doesn't start at all.

My wife has this programme on her Linux Mint laptop and it has run faultlessly for her for several years. An added feature is that you can convert any image you have into a jigsaw puzzle resulting in an almost endless supply of new puzzles.

However, I have to agree with 'Dewman''s review here. I have just done a fresh installation of Ubuntu 18.04 and noticed this program while installing my 'usual' ones, but I cannot get this to launch. 

I have given three stars because I KNOW that it is good software - when it works, but for some reason it will not open for me.

I am usually quite sceptical of reviews that state "Doesn't Work!", when there are reviews that clearly indicate that the software DOES work, but in this instance, being a 'not yet used' operating system i.e. no corruption has crept in. I still cannot get it to run.

If anybody running Ubuntu 18.04 has this running, I would be very interested to hear.

(P.S. it is extremely useful to state your operating system when reviewing.)

Thanks for reading this far.

Thisisi
summary: Doesn't open in a new installation of Ubuntu 18.04

description: Ran flawlessly for months. Then it quit working for weeks. Then it started working again for months. It has quit again! UBUNTU 18.04.06 LTS

Although the program did not launch as I waited for many seconds, it did launch immediately when I picked on the installation window border. I see that the other reviews are from 2020-2021. I have just installed; coincidentally the version 23.04.1 has been updated on the same day as my install. The updated version may be why it runs on this OS. I have noticed, in the past, that I must sometimes wait for awhile to allow programs to launch or I must do something else that 'triggers' a launch. That it launched immediately when I 'touched' the installation window may be a coincidence. I like this puzzle program, it's a wonderful distraction using the smaller puzzles (have not tried larger yet). Nicely done program !

Eine ausführlichere Bewertung des Programms ist leider nicht möglich, da es sich einfach nicht starten lassen möchte. Der Startvorgang bricht stets nach wenigen Sekunden ohne irgendeine Fehlermeldung ab.
Wird jetzt sofort wieder gelöscht. Bevor solche Programme in das Software Center geladen werden können, sollten sie zumindest laufen.
summary: Programm lässt sich unter Ubuntu 18.04 LTS nicht starten

description: Otros programas de KDE corren en Gnome, pero este juego no corrió, espero puedan corregirlo
Très facile à utiliser, fonctionne parfaitement. Et on peut créer autant de puzzles que l'on veut avec ses propres images. Bravo développeur, beau travail ! Et MERCI pour ces bons moments de détente.
Well polished game, just missing rotation of parts for more challenge
